overview:
John is an experienced leader, entrepreneur, and technologist IN 2012, John sold his first company to Infoteria–A leading Japanese enterprise software company listed in the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Prior to selling Extentech Inc,. John bootstrapped Extentech for ten years, and even managed to make a profit in 2008 during the down turn. John is unique visionary and entrepreneur–running a company for over a decade without VC money, as a result sold Extentech company as a 100% owner. Something most founders never see.

John excels at analyzing problem domains, then cross-pollinating ideas and technologies in order to develop innovative solutions that are not only outside the box, but that build on top of the box.

Leveraging battle-tested best practices in business methodology, John executes business vision by utilizing a broad skill set which includes writing, marketing, sales, programming, branding, business strategy, service design, systems, management, and customer service. John is also a visionary driven to inspire his team to excellence in reaching their goals.
